creator: matti.roloux@amplexor.com
text:
I recently upgraded from FOP 0.93 to 0.94. Using 0.94, GIF images are not 
shown in rendered PDF's. JPG's and PNG's work just fine, but GIF's do no show 
up.

Steps to reproduce: on 0.94, just run FOP with images.fo as input. The GIF 
image is not shown.

Any thoughts?

Created attachment 21238
Result of rendering images.fo
creator: matti.roloux@amplexor.com

text:
I ran FOP from the command line, and noticed the following error:

java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/sun/jimi/core/Jimi

Including the JIMI classes solved the problem.
creator: matti.roloux@amplexor.com
gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
